caption: Since COVID, my wife and I do not go out to eat. Today, however, was our Anniversary and we decided to make an exception and to go to Sottosale. Why? Because they deliver! Not to our home, silly. Ivo is an amazingly outstanding Chef. Mario, the Manager, provides warmth, levity, and professionalism to the front of the house. Everyone there is COVID compliant. It seems like they have expanded the quasi-covered garden area to accommodate more seating, and the tables are separated far apart. But I digress. Now for the food! We began tonight's meal with spaghetti cacio e pepe, an item not on the regular menu, but Ivo made it for us. The pasta was a perfect al dente coated with cheesy, peppery goodness! And the portion was huge! My wife had her favorite dish on the menu, the signature Branzino Sottosale, the restaurant's namesake, which quite literally means "Under Salt". This delectable fish was first wrapped in a banana leaf, then crusted with salt, and baked in a wood burning pizza oven. Then, the server brings it tableside, cracks open the salt shell, and serves this moist, delicious fish without the head, skin, or bones. The side dish was grilled asparagus, perfectly cooked, slightly crunchy. Tons of flavor! I ordered the pasta special for my main course, spaghetti with clams, mussels, bottarga, and asparagus in a white wine sauce. The bottarga gave it just that extra something to let it taste even more of the sea...not fishy. I savored every bite! For dessert, we enjoyed their Coppa Sottosale, three scoops of ice cream, whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and nuts. We ordered a side of Nutella, just because! Sottosale is the bees knees, a beautiful oasis in a decidedly urban section of town. Oh, you can also buy the wine on the menu by the bottle from there! As many times as we have recommended this restaurant, we have always gotten rave reviews, and I echo that sentiment this evening.

An amazing little gem of a find in the Mimo district of Miami during a short 4 day getaway 20 minutes south in Miami Beach. Off the beaten path but well worth the trip! Dined in a small yet quaint outdoor terrace area, with string lighting and pleasant decor. Mario was the server and was very engaging without being overbearing. Food was absolutely delicious, from the appetizer to the Lobster Ravioli, which was one of the specials that night. Everything is CLEARLY made fresh and the pricing is impressive. One more thing - this place takes the CDC recommendations amidst the COVID-19 crisis very responsibly and seriously, which was an added plus. Can't go wrong here, either for a casual dinner or for a special night out.
Amazing food, prices, service.
Love this place. Love the food. Love the Wine. Love everything. Please dont miss this place.
Really nice restaurant, good food and excellent service. I totally recommend
Service and food, were excellent!
Came here just to try it out and the food was great. We will definitely be back.
(Translated by Google) Very good Restaurant highly recommended  (Original) Muy buen Restaurant altamente recomendable
Best Italian in Miami! Amazing pizzas and pastas

It was absolutely amazing, thank you to Mario for being so full of love and hospitality! They make you feel right at home here, definitely will be coming back for the food and the envoirment! This is authentic Italian, 10/10 yærd!
The staff is awesome the food is delicious no complaints
Nice place to enjoy scrumptious Italian food with loved ones. We tried their appetizers and pizza, coming away impressed with their culinary skills!

(Translated by Google) I thought I liked pasta, but I realized that I had not tasted the true flavor !!! Thank you Sottosale for delighting my palate !!!  (Original) Pensé que me gustaba la pasta, pero me di cuenta que no había probado el verdadero sabor!!! Gracias Sottosale por deleitar mi paladar!!!
One of the best Italian restaurants in South FL. The service and food are excellent. Everyone form Mario to the rest of the staff are very friendly and professional.
It is a clean and neat place to eat. Good food, and costumer service, covid safety rules apply.
Food yummy! Warm friendly atmosphere and amazing service.  Will return soon!

Rustic Italian in the Mimo districts , pretty authentic Italian dishes and a great pasta pomodoro which wasn’t on the menu but the chef made for me 🍝 💗 Service could improve , waiters were not very attentive and very slow
They offer a great range of fresh food. I loved eating here. Staff members are always very nice, prices are convenient and the spot is always well organised.
I had a pleasant experience at Sottosale. The Manager will greed you and take you to your seat, I ordered the Risotto that is on the menu and it was delicious. They also have a good wine selection
Chicken Alfredo was beautiful
Nice ambiance, friendly service, good food.
Amazing food.
Best food in town!  The chef does magic!
Delicious food all the way  around! We had the homemade bucatini along with Parrillada. Wonderful wine choices!
Mario is an amazing host, waiter, food runner, sommelier. Love the place, the ambience and the great service. Good italian restaurant
We had a great server. Food was VERY slow in showing up. Taste was good. A bit pricey for the size of the food. Beer was perfectly chilled. Would give a second chance.

Food was absolutely delicious, from the appetizer to the Lobster Ravioli, which was one of the specials that night. Everything is CLEARLY made fresh and the pricing is impressive. One more thing - this place takes the CDC recommendations amidst the COVID-19 crisis very responsibly and seriously, which was an added plus. Can't go wrong here, either for a casual dinner or for a special night out.
best pizza in the area! (rest of food is good too!)
Love truffle burrata
Amazing PIZZA! And other great italian food! Ivo Mazzon best chef!

Went to this restaurant not expecting much but I was wrong.  Food was amazing, fresh warm bread and service on top, great selection of wines    We had the burrata truffata, green salad and seafood pasta for dinner.  ah! And panacotta was just delicious.  Highly recommended.
A fantastic place!  We live in shorecrest just up the street.  Delicious Italian food from a wood oven and staff and chef that remember you by name.
Great food. Every dish had lots of fresh flavor. Very nice ambiance too.  Would definitely go back. Hopefully the quality is consistent which is hard to find in Miami.
(Translated by Google) The food is very enjoyed and has an extensive menu  (Original) Se disfruta mucho  la comida y tiene un extenso menú
One of the few amazing restaurants with Real Italian Food and Real italian ingridients in Miami. Also best tiramisu ever.
Great dinner and the restaurant is very romantic. Authentic italian Food and I will be back soon
I Love Italian Food Because of my family but this place make me feel like home . Excellent food and service
FOOD WAS SO GOOD BUT THE AMBIANCE IS NOT RELAXING.
Very delicious!!!  Great flavors and authentic!! Staff very very friendly!!
Great. simply great.
Looking forward to my second visit...
OMG excellent.  Food, service, atmosphere.  Do not pass this place up.
(Translated by Google) Deliciosa Pizza 🍕 y Panacota 🍨 for everyone  (Original) Deliciosa Pizza 🍕 y Panacota 🍨 per tutti raggazzi

Definitely one of the best original italian food in town. They didn't have a vegetarian option on the menu, but made something up for my needs. Owner is always there to make sure everything is perfect.
Good food and excellent treatment

What a great outside area for Dinner, the night was fantastic, Dinner 1A EXCELLENT, Ivo is without a doubt one of the best Chef  in Miami.  1. Place fantastic brings history back in design spaces. 2. Food Excellent made daily 3. Mario great personality, a plus for restaurant 4. Great wine selection 5. A beautiful Bar to enjoy a fine Italian wine.  100% recommended. 👏👏👏👏👏👏👌🔝
Amazing! Wine selection is legit. Food is 5-stars and the service is friendly and fun! We are now officially regulars. Forgot to add that the pizza is dynamite!
Amazing food. Definitely coming again.

An amazing little gem of a find in the Mimo district of Miami during a short 4 day getaway 20 minutes south in Miami Beach. Off the beaten path but well worth the trip! Dined in a small yet quaint outdoor terrace area, with string lighting and pleasant decor. Mario was the server and was very engaging without being overbearing. Food was absolutely delicious, from the appetizer to the Lobster Ravioli, which was one of the specials that night. Everything is CLEARLY made fresh and the pricing is impressive. One more thing - this place takes the CDC recommendations amidst the COVID-19 crisis very responsibly and seriously, which was an added plus. Can't go wrong here, either for a casual dinner or for a special night out.
One of the best options from the many Italian restaurants in the neighborhood. Mario, the manager, truly made our visit a pleasant one.
Fresh food
Delightful ambiance & excellent food! An amazing menu variety and some servers are from Italy so it feels like a more authentic Italian experience. A must visit!
Eating there was really nice in their outdoor area. One time I ordered delivery tho and it was a mess. I recommend eating there on the romantic patio on a nice date.
Delicious! We’ll be back!
Very good service, good safety protocols, tasty food, generous portions and fair prices.

Excellent food and service. Everyone was so friendly and accommodating.  During this uncertain time, they were very well prepared. Great set up for social distancing,  staff wearing masks, plenty of hand sanitizer. We had the burrata with truffles and speck, which was outstanding. Both of our meals were also very tasty. Will return for sure.
Love it! Great Customer service and excellent food.
Great Restaurant for pastas & pizza. Charming ambiance. Can't wait till they're open again@
Ivo is the best chef ever. Very nice environment, very friendly. Love it
We had pizza, burata, and a mixed meat plate.  The food was excellent and the staff was attentive and courteous.  We had an excellent dinner.

Absolutely delicious! Clean, charming restaurant with fresh, delicious pasta dishes. Pizza was one of the best. Much to choose from on the menu, along with very inviting daily specials. Reasonably priced food & wine.
I guess because of the time we went, the service wasn't great. The food was good, came out quickly and was enjoyable.
Best authentic Italian food. Best Italian Chef!

(Translated by Google) Excellent restaurant, fair prices and a really friendly environment, Highly recommended !!  (Original) Ottimo ristorante, prezzi onesti e un ambiente davvero amichevole, Consigliatissimo!!

The food was good and at a good price. The servers were nice but not knowledgeable or helpful.  I read on Instagram that they have nightly specials i.e. wine specials on Wed and beer specials on Thursday. . When I asked my server, she only knew about wine Wednesday.  She told me to check Instagram.  I asked another server.  He had no idea. The manager I asked as I was leaving was helpful with answers.   I think if the employees stay they will get better with time. I hope so. We are locals and the food was good. I will give them another try.

I came here with my family tonight after the wait for the Thai place across the street was too long and we are all so glad we gave it a shot! Everything was DELICIOUS. We shared a pizza, cooked to perfection, and a couple of large dishes such as the lasagna, the lamb rigatoni and the bucatini pasta dish (I don't remember the name). So the food was definitely 10/10 The service was also so lovely!! We had some great conversations with both our waiter and the manager, we really felt like we were being brought into the family! I highly recommend coming here for a wonderful experience and authentic Italian food!

Nice Italian rustic dining restaurant in Mimo District on Biscayne Blvd. Authentic Italian. Good pizzas and pastas. They have also Wine Bar/Market area.  Outdoor seating available and parking lot.  Good for intimate dining and larger groups as well.

The lamb was delicious, the setting great, & the wines were fantastic.  What??!!?? You can get the lamb with rigatoni???  A great evening, pretty reasonable prices, and wine selection for every wallet.
Was very nice . Great food and service at a more than reasonable price
Great food Great prices Good wines

Really tasty lunch Break Nice restaurant, really nice Vino's area/bar  super reasonable price andfor those, low corckage fee(10 dollars). I had a main course of salmon on roasted asparagus and arugula. It was really good. Pizza looks great...next time.
Amazing food, prices, service and convenient parking and location. Great for family, date or sole Dining.
A really good place to have a nice meal, or have some drinks. Or both!!!
food is delicious, great service, ambient is good. Highly recommended
Huge addition to North Miami. Sophisticated Italian food. In the class of Macchialina, Miami's best.
Nice design, very cozy ambience, good service, good food, reasonable price. Definitely will repeat it!
Amazing location. Chef Ivo is absolutely the  best chef in town 😉
Great, authentic food just like being in Italy.  Reasonable prices and free parking too.
Pizza and dessert are excellent
Service, Ambience and Meal A+ Look forward to returning Very enjoyable, top notch on hospitality.
Great food not expensive at all

Came here with my family for a celebration and all of the food was incredible. The cuisine is authentic southern Italian, and the staff is very knowledgeable about the food. A lot of love obviously is going into the operation.
Decent location, parking could be better, especially on busy days/nights, food is great, prices are quite reasonable in this family style establishment. Menu could be a bit more diverse however.

Food was excellent. Nice Italian add to the neighborhood.  Restaurant has a nice ambiance  We had an issue with our check being over charged which I noticed the day after. I called and the manager Mario immediately corrected the issue an refund me. He handled the issue very well and was very apologetic.  We will definable come back !

A wonderful addition to the neighborhood, true italian food served by wonderful italian staff. I like the theme around “salt”. The new operators turned this place into a cosy eatery. A few suggestions: improve lighting in the dining area- its too bright, one of the spots basically shone into my face. Maybe add some votive candles? The message you chose to display on the billboard does not reflect your concept. I will be back!
What a wonderful experience we had last evening!  Wine choices were great and the food so yummy from start to finish. Staff very attentive. A must!
Just amazing. Great food and awesome service. A new dimond in Miami. And not expensive, very resonate pricing. A must visit. Try the beer!
Chef Ivo is fantastic. Authentic Northern Italian cuisine, great atmosphere and traditionally outstanding Italian hospitality.

Can’t say enough about the service and friendly hospitality especially from Mario. Now the food ...Order the Agnello  Di Ivo  a slow cooked lamb rich and delic! and authentically Italian with waiters that know their foods. Ambience is inviting and warm. Will be back!
amazing!! beautifull place,good food and service!!
Very nice place, food was excellent!!
(Translated by Google) VERY BEAUTIFULL! VERY GOOD!! Italian! Go try it !!!  (Original) BELLISSIMO! BUONISSIMO!! Italiani! Andate a provarlo!!!
Awesome ambient, delicious food and great price. I had a lamb a it was beyond amazing, make your selfe a favor and try some authentic Italian food by chef Ivo Mazzon. Can't wait to go back

Chef Ivo is back with a new take to his modern Italian food .  Service is great. I loved the salt display and interior design . YOU MUST TRY the Agnielo di Ivo probably the best lamb I've tried. The pipete Al salmone was incredible, topped with hardened ricotta shavings .. ugh I am just dying to come back ! Cannot compete with these prices either !!
This place is awesome. The food is so good and is is the perfect place to go eat.
I loved this place, the food was delicious and the place very nice, I recommend it !
Wonderful rustic interior with a cool European vibe.  The food is great Italian and the wine bar is vibrant with a large selection of wines.  They even have bottles for purchase!
